database.name: VIEW SSA_CONTRACT_PAYSCHED_INV_V
database.view: SELECT DISTINCT ON (ps.c_invoice_id) ps.ssa_contract_payment_sched_id || ps.c_invoice_id AS ssa_contract_paysched_inv_v_id, ps.ad_client_id, ps.ad_org_id, ps.isactive, ps.created, ps.createdby, ps.updated, ps.updatedby, ps.ssa_projprop_contract_id, ps.c_currency_id, ps.ssa_project_property_id, ps.c_invoice_id AS documentid, ps.ssa_contract_payment_sched_id FROM ssa_contract_payment_sched ps JOIN ssa_projprop_contract c ON c.ssa_projprop_contract_id = ps.ssa_projprop_contract_id WHERE ps.c_invoice_id IS NOT NULL AND c.docstatus <> 'DR' UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT ON (ps.creditmemo_id) ps.ssa_contract_payment_sched_id || ps.creditmemo_id AS ssa_contract_paysched_inv_v_id, ps.ad_client_id, ps.ad_org_id, ps.isactive, ps.created, ps.createdby, ps.updated, ps.updatedby, ps.ssa_projprop_contract_id, ps.c_currency_id, ps.ssa_project_property_id, ps.creditmemo_id AS documentid, ps.ssa_contract_payment_sched_id FROM ssa_contract_payment_sched ps JOIN ssa_projprop_contract c ON c.ssa_projprop_contract_id = ps.ssa_projprop_contract_id WHERE ps.creditmemo_id IS NOT NULL AND c.docstatus <> 'DR'
